public interface ExeMapper

    • selectById

      @Select("SELECT *\nFROM `exe`\nWHERE `id` = #{exeId}\nLIMIT 1\n") java.util.Optional<ExeEntity> selectById​(java.lang.Integer exeId)

    • findGitHubIdSetByIds

      @Select("<script>\nSELECT `github_repo_id`\nFROM `exe`\n<where>\n `id` IN\n <foreach item=\"exeId\" collection=\"exeIds\" open=\"(\" separator=\",\" close=\")\">\n #{exeId}\n </foreach>\n</where>\nGROUP BY `github_repo_id`\n</script>\n") java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> findGitHubIdSetByIds​(@Param("exeIds") java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> exeIds)

    • insert

      @Insert("INSERT INTO exe\n(\n id,\n md5,\n version,\n github_repo_id,\n description,\n distribution_asset_id,\n phase\n)\nVALUES\n(\n #{id},\n #{md5},\n #{version},\n #{gitHubRepoId},\n #{description},\n #{distributionAssetId},\n #{phase}\n)\n") void insert​(@NonNull @NonNull ExeEntity exeDao)

    • update

      @Update("<script>\nUPDATE `exe`\n<set>\n <if test=\"data.id != null\">id=#{data.id},</if>\n <if test=\"data.gitHubRepoId != null\">github_repo_id=#{data.gitHubRepoId},</if>\n <if test=\"data.md5 != null\">md5=#{data.md5},</if>\n <if test=\"data.version != null\">version=#{data.version},</if>\n <if test=\"data.description != null\">description=#{data.description},</if>\n <if test=\"data.distributionAssetId != null\">distribution_asset_id=#{data.distributionAssetId},</if>\n <if test=\"data.phase != null\">phase=#{data.phase},</if>\n <if test=\"data.autoUpdate != null\">auto_update=#{data.autoUpdate}</if>\n</set>\n<where>\n <if test=\"condition.gitHubRepoId != null\">\n AND github_repo_id = #{condition.gitHubRepoId}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.md5 != null\">\n AND md5 = #{condition.md5}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.phase != null\">\n AND phase = #{condition.phase}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.id != null\">\n AND id = #{condition.id}\n </if>\n</where>\n</script>\n") void update​(@Param("condition") @NonNull @NonNull ExeSelectCondition condition, @Param("data") ExeEntity exeDao)

    • delete

      @Delete("<script>\nDELETE FROM exe\n<where>\n id = #{id}\n</where>\n</script>\n") void delete​(@NonNull @NonNull java.lang.Integer id)

    • selectByCondition

      @Results(id="exe_entity",value={@Result(property="distributionAssetId",column="distribution_asset_id"),@Result(property="gitHubRepoId",column="github_repo_id")}) @Select("<script>\nSELECT *\nFROM `exe`\n<where>\n <if test=\"condition.gitHubRepoId != null\">\n AND github_repo_id = #{condition.gitHubRepoId}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.md5 != null\">\n AND md5 = #{condition.md5}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.phase != null\">\n AND phase = #{condition.phase}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.id != null\">\n AND id = #{condition.id}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.autoUpdate != null\">\n AND auto_update = #{condition.autoUpdate}\n </if>\n</where>\nORDER BY `version` DESC,`phase` ASC\nLIMIT #{offset}, #{requestCount}\n</script>\n") java.util.List<ExeEntity> selectByCondition​(@Param("condition") ExeSelectCondition condition, @Param("offset") java.lang.Long offset, @Param("requestCount") java.lang.Integer requestCount)

    • countByConditionWithLimit

      @Select("<script>\nSELECT COUNT(*)\nFROM (\n SELECT id\n FROM `exe`\n <where>\n <if test=\"condition.gitHubRepoId != null\">\n AND github_repo_id = #{condition.gitHubRepoId}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.md5 != null\">\n AND md5 = #{condition.md5}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.phase != null\">\n AND phase = #{condition.phase}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.id != null\">\n AND id = #{condition.id}\n </if>\n <if test=\"condition.autoUpdate != null\">\n AND auto_update = #{condition.autoUpdate}\n </if>\n </where>\n LIMIT #{maxLimit}\n) AS selectByCondition\n</script>\n") java.lang.Integer countByConditionWithLimit​(@Param("condition") ExeSelectCondition condition, @Param("maxLimit") java.lang.Long maxLimit)
